HTMLElementDraggable.summary: The draggable property of the interface gets and sets a {{jsxref("Boolean")}} primitive indicating if the element is draggable.

remarks.para: It reflects the value of the draggable HTML global attribute.

-draggable HTML global attribute
-HTML Drag and Drop API overview

HTMLElementDraggable.value: A primitive that is true if the element is draggable, false otherwise.
